Body:
template = """<%
            print('hi')
            # this is a comment
            # another comment
            x = 7 # someone's '''comment
            print('''
        there
        ''')
            # someone else's comment
%> '''and now some text '''"""
nodes = Lexer(template).parse()
self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [Code(
    """
print('hi')
# this is a comment
# another comment
x = 7 # someone's '''comment
print('''
        there
        ''')
# someone else's comment

"""
    , False, (1, 1)), Text(" '''and now some text '''", (10, 3))]))
